entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning after midnight. Rain showers and ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or periods of ice pellets changing to a few flurries in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
